WITH all_parts AS (
SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS date_part FROM dual
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
SELECT ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -LEVEL + 1) AS date_part FROM dual
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), TO_DATE('2023-01', 'YYYY-MM')) + 1
) SELECT TO_CHAR( all_parts.date_part,
'MM/DD'
'YY/MM'
) AS col, NVL(COUNT(board.board_time), 0) AS count FROM all_parts
LEFT JOIN board ON all_parts.date_part = TRUNC(board.board_time)
LEFT JOIN board ON TO_CHAR(all_parts.date_part, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(board.board_time, 'YYYY-MM')
GROUP BY all_parts.date_part ORDER BY ${order}

SELECT t.tag_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM board b JOIN board_tag t ON b.board_no = t.board_no
and b.board_time >= sysdate-7
and b.board_time >= to_date(#{startDate}||' '||'00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND b.board_time between to_date(#{startDate}||' '||'00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(#{endDate}||' '||'23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and
b.board_time<=to_date(#{endDate}||' '||'23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY t.tag_name ORDER BY count desc
